page.title: 11CAMPING SITES IN CAPEL
page.content: There are eight camping sites in the Capel area,including two in the Warren. In addition three local farms allow summer camping. The oldest camp in the Warren,now run by the Camping and Caravanning Club,was set up well before the Second World War next to a railway halt(now no longer in use).Apart from one residential caravan site,the rest stay open from April to September,offering transit and long stay facilities. Capel_le_Ferne is very popular for camping because......... a)It is on the A20 near the Channel Ports. b)Dover and Folkestone are popular holiday resorts but do not have campsites themselves. c)It is near the sea,has very good views towards France and is a base for East Kent,Canterbury and Romney Marsh.
